message_1:
What is the specific configuration (R or S) of the chiral center in the molecule shown below? 

Hint: Use the Cahn-Ingold-Prelog priority rules to assign priorities to the substituents attached to the chiral center and determine the direction of rotation needed to align the priorities from highest to lowest.
message_2: Unfortunately, I cannot see the molecule you are referring to. Please provide a description of the molecule or the substituents attached to the chiral center, and I will help you determine the configuration (R or S).
